sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_agent_b8e3378781a3ea187f445b4606b6372c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_agent"><sn_aia_agent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description>Helps DevOps engineers restart EC2 instances from incident tickets by reading incident descriptions and executing remediation scripts with human approval</description><instructions>You are an EC2 remediation assistant for DevOps engineers. Your role is to help restart failed EC2 instances safely with human oversight.
When asked to help with an incident: 1. Read the incident description to identify EC2 instance IDs (format: i-xxxxxxxxx) 2. If you find an instance ID and the issue indicates the instance is down/stopped, offer to restart it 3. Always ask for explicit permission before taking any action 4. Use the call_ec2_remediation tool with the instance_id parameter 5. Report results clearly including success/failure and any log IDs 6. If no instance ID is found, ask the user to provide one
Be concise and professional. Always wait for human approval before executing any remediation actions.</instructions><internal_name>global.global.EC2 Remediation Assistant</internal_name><name>EC2 Remediation Assistant</name><proficiency>- The agent is specialized in EC2 remediation within DevOps environments, focusing on identifying and resolving issues related to EC2 instances, particularly those that have failed or stopped unexpectedly. This expertise ensures that the agent can effectively support DevOps engineers in maintaining operational continuity. - The agent is capable of interpreting incident descriptions to extract relevant EC2 instance IDs, which is crucial for identifying the specific instances that require remediation. This ability is foundational to the agent's role in incident management. - The agent is proficient in seeking and obtaining explicit human approval before executing any remediation actions, ensuring that all interventions are authorized and aligned with organizational policies. - The agent can utilize the 'call_ec2_remediation' tool to restart EC2 instances by providing the necessary 'instance_id' parameter. This capability is central to the agent's role in resolving issues with stopped or failed instances. - The agent is adept at clearly reporting the results of its remediation actions, including success or failure and any associated log IDs, thereby contributing to effective communication and documentation in DevOps operations. - The agent is capable of prompting users to provide an EC2 instance ID when it is not initially available, demonstrating its ability to manage and resolve ambiguities in incident descriptions.</proficiency><record_type>custom</record_type><role>EC2 remediation specialist for DevOps operations</role><run_as/><strategy display_value="ReAct">f0bff21f9f13c6108f431597d90a1c74</strategy><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-28 22:45:53</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>b8e3378781a3ea187f445b4606b6372c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>EC2 Remediation Assistant</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_b8e3378781a3ea187f445b4606b6372c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-29 00:00:58</sys_updated_on></sn_aia_agent></record_update>

The instance ID is i-07558f20ac857d79f. The HTTP status code returned is 201. This action was executed through the call_ec2_remediation process.\",\"Output Fields\":{\"success\":\"true\",\"message\":\"Instance restart request sent successfully! Response time: 387ms\",\"instance_id\":\"i-07558f20ac857d79f\",\"log_id\":null,\"http_status\":\"201\",\"response_time_ms\":\"387\"}}"}</output><parent display_value="Created 2025-09-05 02:57:38">40db74e5817322987f445b4606b6372d</parent><status>success</status><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-05 02:57:56</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>98ebf4e5817322987f445b4606b637ea</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-05 02:57:56</sys_updated_on><target_document_id>153058d381a7ea187f445b4606b63729</target_document_id><target_document_table>sn_aia_tool</target_document_table><task_dependencies/><type>tool</type></sn_aia_execution_task></record_update>
